title: I am laughing. You need to pay money to even play the game.
body:
Look at this shit, I am crying laughing.

Why would anyone play this game? Pay to even PLAY, f2p my rear end.

It LITERALLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYY compares how many f2p vs. non f2p players there are.

Yeah this game sure is good, ROFL.

http://i.imgur.com/Cl3wLWd.jpg
